short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn Notion pages into presentable slides

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn Notion pages into presentable slides
and start presenting the Notion way. 

- Hides the Notion top bar for a clean view
- Automatically slides from header to header (each H1 becomes a new slide, optionally dividers serve as a pagebreak)
- Enables fullscreen presentation mode
- Editable in presentation mode
- Export slides as PDF with the right page breaks in landscape or portrait format according to Chrome's PDF settings
- Set individual header padding 

Present directly from your Notion pages - no extra setup needed.

For Feature Requests, Support, and Presentation Templates visit: https://presentation-mode.notion.site/Presentation-Mode-for-Notion-1617e8ec02158080af4bf0b9515ef3bc
